# center

**Instance Property**

The x and y position to use as the center of the dot screen pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
var center: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **angle**: The angle of the pattern.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **sharpness**: The sharpness of the pattern.
- **width**: The distance between dots in the pattern.
